restaurants.name: Nandos
restaurants.description: African, Portueges, Grill cuisine. Peri-peri chicken, take-away and dine in. Vegetarian friendly, Gluten free options.
restaurants.review: As a spicy-lover and a chicken-lover, I always enjoy my meal experiences at Nandos and it was the same here. Tried Chicken Pita meal and 1/4 Chicken w/ PERi PERi Chips. Liked it with spicy PERi PERi sauce as always :)

restaurants.name: Mekong Cafe
restaurants.review: Value for money. Pho was really delicious! This place is known for one thing- the pho. My partner ordered the Combination fish pho and as much as I loved my Been pho There was a touch of food ennvy, I could really taste the beef bones and marrow that have been boiling for hours and hours. Excellent, bringing a taste of Vietnam to Wellington.

restaurants.name: KK Malaysian Restaurant
restaurants.review: Great taste - the food came out within 2 mins
